full_output.summary: B.Tech CSE student specializing in Data Science at SRM-AP University. Proficient in machine learning, web development, and experienced in Python, Java, and C++. Eager to apply my skills in innovative, real-time projects.

projects.name: Data Scientist Core Project on Telecommunication Industry
projects.description: Performed exploratory data analysis (EDA) on a Telco customer churn dataset with 7,000+ records, leveraging Pandas and Seaborn to identify trends and outliers. Developed an interactive heatmap to visualize customer behavior across 12 key features, uncovering insights that contributed to a 20% improvement in customer satisfaction. Implemented and optimized machine learning models such as Random Forest, Naive Bayes, AdaBoost, and XGBoost, achieving a churn prediction accuracy of 80.34%. Utilized cross-validation to compare models and enhance performance metrics and helping reduce churn rates by 74%.

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: Designed and implemented a system to manage library operations including user management, book borrowing, returns, and catalog maintenance. Utilized Java and MySQL for backend development and HTML/CSS and JavaScript for frontend. Integrated overdue notifications and advanced search filters to improve user experience.

experiences.description: Developed a real-time chat application using AWS Amplify, Next.js, GraphQL, and AWS, integrating user authentication, real-time messaging, and server-side rendering. Led frontend and backend development, deploying to AWS Cloud with scalable infrastructure, ensuring security, and receiving positive feedback for UI/UX and real-time performance.

full_output.name: Bhuvanesh Kakarla
